name: claude-code-sdk-ts (instantlyeasy)
description: [项目级] Fluent, chainable TypeScript SDK: configure models, enable tools, stream events, then fetch text, JSON, run details or token stats in one call via .asText() or .allowTools('Read', 'Write'). Multi-level logging plus live onMessage/onToolUse callbacks give deep, CLI-compatible observability.。来源: https://github.com/instantlyeasy/claude-code-sdk-ts

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Fluent, chainable TypeScript SDK: configure models, enable tools, stream events, then fetch text, JSON, run details or token stats in one call via .asText() or .allowTools('Read', 'Write'). Multi-level logging plus live onMessage/onToolUse callbacks give deep, CLI-compatible observability.

来源: https://github.com/instantlyeasy/claude-code-sdk-ts
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 203
